long_description: Summer's calling you for a hike. Throw on the women's adidas Hiking Stretch Shorts with motion-loving stretch and a mere 3-inch inseam that really lets you stride. Nylon/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for full freedom of movement. Shorts have pre-rolled cuffs held with tabs. The women's adidas Hiking Stretch Shorts feature hand pockets, 2 rear pockets and belt loops.
short_description: Summer's calling you for a hike. Throw on the women's adidas Hiking Stretch Shorts with motion-loving stretch and a mere 3-inch inseam that really lets you stride.
